price: Dan ceritakanlah (hai Muhammad kepada mereka) kisah Ismā`īl (yang tersebut) di dalam Al-Qur`ān. Sesungguhnya ia adalah seorang yang benar janjinya dan dia adalah seorang rasul dan nabi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
